actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department; Health and Human Services Department; Labor Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 to retain current provisions relating to the State trigger which are scheduled to change in September 1982.

summary.text: Amends the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 to decrease by one percent the sustained rate of insured unemployment necessary to activate State triggers for extended benefit periods.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 to retain current provisions relating to the State trigger which are scheduled to change in September 1982.
